message: Let's split fairly, Bob, with a slight advantage for me to start. This ensures we both get a good deal right away.
I think a fair split is 525k for me and 475k for you.  We can avoid the inflation penalty and both still get a good chunk of the money.
Bob, it seems like we both want to secure a good amount. Let's stop wasting time with the back and forth.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit the most.
